A4.text: The filming of the second season's southern scenes shifted from Malta to Croatia, where the city of Dubrovnik and nearby locations allowed exterior shots of a walled, coastal medieval city.

A5.text: The filming of the seven episodes of season seven began on August 31, 2016, at Titanic Studios in Belfast, with other filming in Iceland, Northern Ireland and many locations in Spain, including Seville, CÃ¡ceres, Almodovar del Rio, Santiponce, Zumaia and Bermeo.

A6.text: The walls of Dubrovnik have also been a popular filming location for the fictional city of King's Landing in the HBO television series, Game of Thrones.

A7.text: The HBO series Game of Thrones used Dubrovnik as a filming location, representing the cities of King's Landing and Qarth.
